DOC.brief_summary: Results previous study inconclusive effect linezolid cytokine remain unclear . This study design evaluate effect linezolid functionality white blood cell ( neutrophils monocyte ) healthy subject .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Linezolid Ex Vivo Neutrophil Monocyte Function Healthy Males
DOC.criteria: Healthy male subject age 20 45 year , inclusive ( Healthy define clinically relevant abnormality identify detailed medical history , full physical examination , include blood pressure pulse rate measurement clinical laboratory test ) . Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 17.5 30.5 kg/m2 ; total body weight > 50 kg ( 110 lb ) . Any condition possibly affect drug absorption ( eg , gastrectomy ) . Subject bacterial/viral infection within 2 week prior first dose study medication . Subjects current prior neutropenia ( eg , < 1.4 x 109 neutrophil /L ) .
